en.detach_volume_tip: Before detaching the volume, please make sure to stop read/write the volume and unmount the volume within your instance.
en.is_force_shutdown: Stop the instance. Cut off the power directly. Any data not saved will be lost
en.instance_credential_tip: Once you have set password or keypair, you can only modify it by logining the instance
en.join_network_tip: Adding more than one network may lead to routing problems which will cause poor external networks connetions, please proceed with caution.
en.msg_diss_network: Do you want to leave network?
en.pwd_tip: Password must start with a number or letter, containing both uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers, and the length ranges from 8 to 20.
en.tip_password: Password must start with a number or letter, containing both uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers, and the length ranges from 8 to 20.
en.ensure_shutdown: Do you want to shudown instance {0} ？

zh-CN.detach_volume_tip: 请先在虚拟机中停止对云硬盘的读写，并删除对应的云硬盘，然后再卸载。
zh-CN.is_force_shutdown: 强制关机，直接切断电源。没有及时写入硬盘中的内存数据将会丢失
zh-CN.instance_credential_tip: 一旦密码、密钥确认，将不能在界面上修改，要登陆云主机自行修改
zh-CN.join_network_tip: 加入多个网络可能会引发云主机路由问题而导致连不上外网，请谨慎操作。
zh-CN.pwd_tip: 密码要求必须以数字或字母开头，同时包含大写字母、小写字母、数字，并且长度在8-20位字符之间。
zh-CN.tip_password: 密码要求必须以数字或字母开头，同时包含大写字母、小写字母、数字，并且长度在8-20位字符之间。
